value.title: AI language models need to shrink; here’s why smaller may be better
value.excerpt: Large language models (LLMs) used for generative AI tools can consume vast amounts of processor cycles and be costly to use. Smaller, more industry- or business-tailored models can often provide better results tailored to business needs.

value.title: Microsoft offers legal protection for AI copyright infringement challenges
value.excerpt: On Thursday, Microsoft announced that it will provide legal protection for customers who are sued for copyright infringement over content generated by the company's AI systems. This new policy, called the Copilot Copyright Commitment, is an expansion of Microsoft's existing intellectual property indemnification coverage, Reuters reports.
